ProjectTitle: The SIXTH project: Studying the Impact of Cross-border Digital Public Services enabling the EU Digital Single Market
InitialFeedbackHistory:
03/01/2023
Data: Do you have additional datasets, maybe code, scripts, models, existing demographics data? Will you make recordings of the interviews? 
Ethics: Since you do interviews you will process personal data and this has to be registered in the KU Leuven internal processing of personal data register via a PRET application, for more information and procedures see: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index. Please submit an updated DMP as intermediate upon approval. 
Documentation: How will you document the interviews? Do you use for example standard questionnaires, sops and/or codebooks?
Data storage: It is more secure to use KU Leuven servers instead of hard drives, please consult the storage guide to find the most suitable storage solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
You can find more guidance about the different DMP sections on our RDM website: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance
label: good with suggestions
